short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create secure short links on any website with a few clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create secure and memorable short links on any website with a few clicks. 
The default short domain x.tips is the perfect choice for your marketing, product reviews or social media. You can customize the short links or you can use your own brand domains to create a strong relationship to your company.
We check each target URL against a constantly updated list of unsafe web resources. Unsafe web resources include social engineering sites, such as phishing and deceptive sites and sites that host malware or unwanted software.  
You have access to additional features on the cloud platform xssl.cloud like generating individual passwords, limiting the number of accesses or the access period for each link, or creating QR codes in various formats.
User registration is required to create short links. Some functions may require an user account upgrade.
